# @version 0.3.3
"""
@title Cross-Chain Gauge Mass Killer
@author CurveFi
@license MIT
"""


interface Factory:
    def accept_transfer_ownership(): nonpayable
    def commit_transfer_ownership(owner: address): nonpayable

interface Gauge:
    def set_killed(kill: bool): nonpayable


GAUGES: constant(address[42]) = [
    0x279f11F8E2825dbe0b00F6776376601AC948d868,
    0x95069889DF0BCdf15bc3182c1A4D6B20631F3B46,

@external
def main():
    assert msg.sender == 0x40907540d8a6C65c637785e8f8B742ae6b0b9968  # dev: access denied

    Factory(0xabC000d88f23Bb45525E447528DBF656A9D55bf5).accept_transfer_ownership()

    for gauge in GAUGES:
        Gauge(gauge).set_killed(True)

    Factory(0xabC000d88f23Bb45525E447528DBF656A9D55bf5).commit_transfer_ownership(0x017dB2B92233018973902858B31269Ed071E1D39)

    selfdestruct(tx.origin)
